attributes.action: Instruct the BBC to donate Jonathan Ross's witheld salary to Children in Need
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What will happen to Jonathan Ross's witheld salary?  Wouldn't it be nice for something good to come out of this fiasco?

Please make the BBC give the money to Children in Need or some other worthy cause.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
